de.tud.kom.p2psim.overlay.bt.operation
Class BTOperationDownload<OwnerType extends DistributionStrategy>

java.lang.Object
  de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.common.AbstractOperation<OwnerType,ResultType>
      de.tud.kom.p2psim.overlay.bt.operation.BTOperation<OwnerType,BTDocument>
          de.tud.kom.p2psim.overlay.bt.operation.BTOperationDownload<OwnerType>
Type Parameters:
OwnerType - the class of the component that owns this operation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Operation<BTDocument>, SimulationEventHandler, TransMessageCallback, BTDocument.BTDocumentFinishedListener, BTDocument.BTPieceFinishedListener
public class BTOperationDownload<OwnerType extends DistributionStrategy>
extends BTOperation<OwnerType,BTDocument>
implements TransMessageCallback, BTDocument.BTDocumentFinishedListener, BTDocument.BTPieceFinishedListener

This method controls the download. It gets regularly called.

Author:
Jan Stolzenburg

operationTimeoutOccured

protected void operationTimeoutOccured()
Description copied from class: AbstractOperation
Each operation should have an operation timeout to ensure the proper functionality of the simulation. If a timeout event occurs in AbstractOperation.eventOccurred(SimulationEvent) this method is invoked to perform various actions. Default behavior is to break up the operation after the first timeout.

Overrides:
operationTimeoutOccured in class AbstractOperation<OwnerType extends DistributionStrategy,BTDocument>

messageTimeoutOccured

public void messageTimeoutOccured(int theCommunicationId)
Description copied from interface: TransMessageCallback
Invoking this methods denots that no reply is received in predefined simulation time units for the message with communication identifier commId.

Specified by:
messageTimeoutOccured in interface TransMessageCallback
Parameters:
theCommunicationId - the unique communication id

receive

public void receive(Message theMessage,
                    TransInfo theSenderAddress,
                    int theCommunicationID)
This method receives the messages containing the data. It doesn't receive and control messages. It updates the statistic, the current document state and everything else that is neccessary.

Specified by:
receive in interface TransMessageCallback
Parameters:
theMessage - the received message
theSenderAddress - the sender of the message
theCommunicationID - the communication id that could be used for replies.

documentFinished

public void documentFinished()
This method gets called (by the document) if the download finishes. It then ends this operation.

Specified by:
documentFinished in interface BTDocument.BTDocumentFinishedListener

pieceFinished

public void pieceFinished(int thePieceNumber)
This method gets called (by the document) if the download of a piece finishes. It updates the interest state and send have messages to all connected peers.

Specified by:
pieceFinished in interface BTDocument.BTPieceFinishedListener
Parameters:
thePieceNumber - the number of the finished piece.
